pages.text: In AutoTerraFirmaCraft $(thing)Andesite Alloy$() has been renamed to $(thing)Igneous$() to better reflect the item's new recipe.$(br2)Rather than requiring Andesite rock specifically, Igneous Alloy can instead be made from any $(l:the_world/geology#igneous_extrusive)Igneous Rock$().$(br2)Related names have also been changed e.g. $(thing)Igneous Casing$().
Igneous Alloy can be made from combining any four $(thing)Magma Blocks$() and two Crushed Iron, Zinc or Nickel Ore in a $(thing)Mechanical Mixer$().

Magma Blocks can be made by heating any $(l:the_world/geology#igneous_extrusive)Igneous Rock$() or found naturally near $(thing)Volcanoes$().$(br2)Magma will also burn infinitely and thus can also be used with the $(thing)Encased Fan$() for bulk baking.
$(br)It's worth noting that in TFC lava-water generators will always produce a raw Igneous Rock type.
